snippet.title: Two dead as plane makes emergency landing in Portugal: reports
snippet.content:
Two people have died after a light aircraft hit several people in an emergency landing on a beach in Portugal, local media reports.
An eight-year-old child is among the victims on the beach at Sao Joao da Caprica, .
It says multiple emergency services personnel are at the scene.
"I only saw people shouting and now there is a heap of people," Diogo Silveira told the newspaper.
More to come... (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
